name: toddsmells
description: ## User Stories ### MVP * The user should be able to enter a phone number for receiving messages * The user should receive an animated GIF every day * The user should receive a trivia question every Monday * The user should receive the answer to the trivia question every Friday * The user should have the ability to opt-out of future messages. * The user should see links to relevent information/sites (Frinkiac, etc...)
